Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Traits.Name: Acidic Hide
Traits.Description: When bloodied, gains counter and adjacent characters cannot benefit from armor or resistance.

Actions.Name: Smother
Actions.Stance: The Doomcloak gains vigor 1, then moves into an adjacent foe's space, sharing it. While in this stance, both this beast and its chosen foe have a max speed of 0 and are winded+. The smothered foe takes [D] piercing damage at the start of their turn, loses all vigor, and cannot gain vigor while being smothered. When the Doomcloak takes at least 1 damage to hp, this stance ends, and it is stunned, moving it into an adjacent space.
